about.description:
FOUND Study Midtown offers students and interns fully furnished, turn-key private and shared units in our centrally located living community. Residents enjoy communal amenities, including 24-hour security, high-speed internet, on-site laundry, study lounges and a large communal kitchen and dining room.

FOUND Study Midtown boasts the most accessible transportation network in Manhattan. The 51 st station is just a couple of steps away from the entrance. There are 8 total subway stations serviced by 10 different subway lines within a half-mile radius making it easy for you to get to where you need to go, fast.
